Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Commands.ClientCommands

Class RestoreGameCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Commands.ClientCommands.RestoreGameCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientCommand, Command, Serializable
public class RestoreGameCommand extends Object implements ClientCommand
Represents a client command to restore a game state on the client side. Implements the ClientCommand interface.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RestoreGameCommand(ClientGame gameDTO, String currentState, Map<String,LinkedHashMap<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>,GenericPair<Integer,Side>>> playersField)
    Constructs a RestoreGameCommand with the specified game DTO, current state, and player's field state.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute(ClientControllerInterface clientController)
    Executes the command on the provided client controller, requesting to restore the game state using the stored DTO, current state, and players' field information.

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • RestoreGameCommand

      public RestoreGameCommand(ClientGame gameDTO, String currentState, Map<String,LinkedHashMap<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>,GenericPair<Integer,Side>>> playersField)
      Constructs a RestoreGameCommand with the specified game DTO, current state, and player's field state.
      Parameters:
      gameDTO - The client game DTO representing the restored game state.
      currentState - The current state identifier indicating where the game was paused.
      playersField - The mapping of players' field states containing card placements and associated information.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(ClientControllerInterface clientController)
      Executes the command on the provided client controller, requesting to restore the game state using the stored DTO, current state, and players' field information.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface ClientCommand
      Parameters:
      clientController - The client controller interface on which to execute the command.
